metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30158 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.31.12 and 1.32.x through1.35.x before 1.35.2. Blocked users are unable to use Special:ResetTokens.This has security relevance because a blocked user might have accidentallyshared a token, or might know that a token has been compromised, and yet isnot able to block any potential future use of the token by an unauthorizedparty.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
